channel.title: paper on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in paper on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 4.3: Another Publication and Plans
item.description: 13the February, 2014 Hello everyone, I’m happy to report my second paper was accepted for publication today. It will become available in another few weeks. Thesis work is progressing well overall.

item.title: 'Garbage out, garbage out' by C.K. Meena
item.description: C.K. Meena is a columnist in The Hindu, one of India´s biggest news papers. She was my teacher when I took up a certificate course in Journalism and we soon became friends.

item.title: You Tear It Up
item.description: From Feb 2009 You tear it up I pick up the pieces and reuse You listen to cruel experiments without flinching I feel sick and want to cry
